title: Fluffy Pancakes
steps: In a bowl, mix all dry ingredients.
Whisk in the milk, egg, and melted butter.
Heat a non-stick pan and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook until golden.

title: Classic Margherita Pizza
steps: Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
Spread tomato sauce over the dough.
Add mozzarella and basil on top.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté onion and garlic.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Pour in tomato sauce, season, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve sauce over spaghetti.

title: Caesar Salad
steps: Chop romaine lettuce and place in a large bowl.
Add Caesar dressing and toss to coat.
Top with croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chocolate Cake
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl.
Add wet ingredients and mix until smooth.
Pour into a greased baking pan.
Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.

title: Cheese Omelette
steps: Whisk eggs, milk, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Heat butter in a non-stick skillet over medium heat.
Pour in egg mixture and cook until almost set.
Sprinkle cheese on one half, fold, and cook until cheese melts.
Serve hot.
